title: Old School Runescape players were using a new bug to mass-murder each other and it got so bad the game had to be taken offline
description: A minor update introduced a major problem.

title: Apex Legends dev boldly declares that 'queue times are too short,' but let's hear them out
description: "Matchmaking is failing at the extreme end of very high skill."

title: Starfield backgrounds: Be who you want to be, in space
description: The story of your captain didn't start when you clicked "New Game," and you get to decide what happened before.

title: 2 years after shooting wrapped, Eli Roth's Borderlands movie is still over a year away
description: The film adaptation of Gearbox's co-op shooter series will be in theaters next summer.

title: Terminator creator James Cameron says AI isn't going to take over Hollywood but it might wipe out humanity: 'I warned you guys in 1984!'
description: Cameron doesn't believe AI can create, but he's pretty sure it can destroy.

title: Armored Core 6 'story trailer' implies Armored Core 6 needs a story beyond dope mechs doing dope shit
description: This story trailer is a thin excuse to watch a three minute cinematic of sick mechanized action. I'll take it.

title: Starfield Early Access: How it works and when you can play
description: With 1000 planets to explore, it can't hurt to get a head start.

title: Diablo 4 queue times 'unusually long' as Season 1 kicks off
description: After a controversial patch, Diablo 4's first seasonal realm is live, and players are piling in.

title: I'm in love with this '80s Japan-themed stock-trading sim that sent me to prison for insider trading
description: Bug report: The rich only ever seem to get richer.

title: Epic Games doubles its reward program for the 2023 Summer Sale, which is live now by the way
description: You'll get 10% back on all eligible purchases made during the course of Epic's big seasonal sale.

title: After being kicked off Steam, Dolphin emulator devs say Nintendo's legal claim 'is a reach': 'Now that we have talked to a lawyer, we are no longer concerned'
description: "The lawyers representing Nintendo... wished to create a narrative where the DMCA's exemptions do not apply to us, as these exemptions are powerful and widely in our favor."

title: Popular fantasy artist claims AI has ripped him off more than Picasso and da Vinci, and his own work is getting buried by the copies
description: "My work and future are under a huge question mark."

title: Humble Bundle's next payload features a bunch of lo-fi games to snuggle up to
description: Autumn's come early this year.

title: PC Gamer Chat Log Episode 21: How are MMOs lookin' these days?
description: Fraser Brown joins Mollie and Lauren to talk about MMOs of past, present and future.

title: Million dollar GPU counterfeiting ring busted by Chinese police
description: The crooks cleaned, repackaged, and sold used GPUs as new to unsuspecting customers online.

title: Roblox data leak sees 4,000 developer profiles including identifying information made public
description: This may cost the company a few Robux.

title: Nobody warned me about Baldur's Gate 3's grotesque opening cutscene
description: My stomach is still turning.

title: I am beyond excited to infest Baldur's Gate 3 with an army of mushroom zombies straight out of The Last of Us
description: Time to trip on some 'shrooms.

title: Kevin Mitnick, former 'most wanted' hacker who police said could launch nukes by whistling into a phone, has died
description: A legend in the history of computing, Mitnick died on July 16 due to complications from pancreatic cancer.

title: Blizzard admits Overwatch 2's 'engagement and player investment' is in decline, while crossing its fingers for the Invasion update
description: No mention of Overwatch 2's Steam integration, which coincidentally launches on the same day.

title: AI will be a 'transformative force for good' says expert-signed open letter that's more like a memo
description: "AI is not an existential threat to humanity."

title: Hey, D&D powergamers: I promise you'll have more fun if you don't min-max in Baldur's Gate 3
description: For this one, let's all spend less time checking our maths and more time enjoying the adventure.

title: Where to get Scattered Prisms in Diablo 4
description: This item allows you to add sockets to gear.

title: Diablo 4's sorcerers just can't catch a break—their new ultra-rare item rewards hours of grinding with motion sickness
description: Sick wand, wand that makes you sick.

title: TSMC is delaying its Arizona foundry over a lack of skilled workers alongsde a $5.85B income slump
description: That's a brutal double whammy of a delay to the vaunted N3 production fab in Arizona to 2025 and a drop in its projected revenue.

title: It's a Gundam shame: yet another live service game goes the way of the Dodo after barely a year
description: Pretty certain live service games are in some sort of demographic crisis at this point.

title: Starfield's economy is already in shambles—a spaceworthy ship can go for as little as 25 sandwiches, 48 steaks, or ten plates of bugs
description: Maybe the sandwich pirate was onto something, after all.

title: EA responds to fan criticism of women players in Ultimate Team by reminding them it's 'fantasy football'
description: "We want this game [...] to welcome everybody."

title: PC Gamer UK September issue on sale now: Baldur's Gate III
description: Plus: Phantom Liberty, Prince of Persia, RuneScape, Star Wars Outlaws, Total War: Pharaoh, Payday 3, and much more!

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #761: Thursday, July 20
description: Help with the #761 Wordle if you need it.

title: 40K's edgelord assassins are coming to turn-based tactics game Chaos Gate – Daemonhunters
description: Execution Force, its second DLC, will be out this month.
